title: Is Kled dropping Karma tether when hopping off his yoshi intentional?
body:
^

Just wondering if that's intended.  I spose it's not that big of a deal unless he's fed, then it's more frustrating to stop him from hopping back onto his Yoshi with his onslaught of auto attacks.  I've heard/seen Karma tether isn't the only ability that breaks when he gets knocked off his Yoshi.

replies.body: tethers should not drop when people be come untargetable. only then they leave range, this is likely a bug
I'm saying.   Spread the word!  YOU ARE A HERO
I can be your hero baby... I'll leave now

The dude Removes himself from the game. it drops ignite, darius passive, lux passive. it even kicks kayn out of him during his ult.
That chicken has caused so much salty of mine its not even funny.

Said this once in the last thread and I'll say it again:

"As a kled main I say: DONT downvote this. I could care less if someone doesn't get a tehter or even an execute when kled falls off skarl. However, his W and E have had KNOWN bugs since he came out!

HE NEEDS THIS ATTENTION WHETHER IT BE BUFF OR NERF. Please upvote even if you disagree. If you DO disagree then just type out why please."

]\'[
It happens because there's a secondary effect coming into place on top of becoming untargettable which is refered to as stasis.
Fizz keeps tethers during his Playful / Trickster.
Upvoted for Yoshi
When he hops off skaarl he becomes untargetable for a moment. Considering that fizz and vlad don't drop tethers, it's probably a bug.
The interactions between fizz and vlad is what made me write this.  Thank you for pointing that out to everybody.
Yes, because when he dismounts he briefly becomes untargetable, also why he can tower dive and dodge hits when he dismounts.
Fizz keeps tethers during his Playful / Trickster.
He drops agro yeah; just like when tower stops shooting him/resets if he gets dismounted while diving and taking tower. No different than fizz troll pole or elise rappel.
Fizz keeps tethers during his Playful / Trickster.

Kled and Snarl are 2 different unit unlike Fizz and Vlad so this is why the tether doesn't stay on Kled. You are basically targeting a new distinct unit. This logic would also cancel all CC such as slows and stuns and summonner spells.

Another example similar with Kled would be Anivia and her Egg or Zac and his passive blobs.
It should be. She tethered Skarl not him.
If it's happening, it's a bug. I haven't seen it happen, though.

When he hops on and off the lizard, he becomes briefly untargetable for a split second, so that's why he drops tethers. Not sure if this is intended or not, but being small Kled sucks in most situations and all you can think about is how to become big Kled again. Being untargetable helps against small Kled's huge disadvantages.
Fizz keeps tethers during his Playful / Trickster.

But Fizz drops most other things like in-flight auto attacks or tower aggro. Same with Zhonya's, which drops nearly everything. It's probably a coding error, where being untargetable is dropping things it usually doesn't. Or maybe it's a unique interaction for Kled, who knows?
Tower aggro and in-flight autos haven't connected yet while tethers connect instantly. Since they already connected, they can't be dodged from being untargetable.
